title: Factor the Perfect Square
text: Does the expression match any of these formats: $${\left(a x\right)}^2+2a b x$$ + $$b^2$$ $$=$$ $${\left(a x+b\right)}^2$$, $${\left(a x\right)}^2-2a b x+b^2$$ $$=$$ $${\left(a x-b\right)}^2$$ ? Yes.

title: Factor the Perfect Square
text: In this case, we can see that $$9n^2-12n+4$$ as $${\left(a x\right)}^2-2a b x+b^2={\left(ax-b\right)}^2$$ where $$ax=3n$$ and $$b=2$$. We can factor $$9n^2-12n+4=25$$ as $${\left(3n-2\right)}^2$$.
speech: In this case, we can see that  9 n squared, minus 12 n plus, 4  as , parentheses a x  squared minus, 2 a b x, plus b squared is equal to parentheses, a x minus b,  squared  where  a x is equal to, 3 n  and  b, is equal to 2 . We can factor  9 n squared minus 12 n plus 4 is equal to 25  as , parentheses, 3 n minus 2,  squared .

title: Rewrite the Equation
speech: We can rewrite  9 n squared, minus 12 n plus 4 is equal to 25  as , parentheses, 3 n minus 2,  squared is equal to 25 .

title: Use Square Root Property
text: The square root property: if $$x^2$$ $$=$$ k, then $$x$$ $$=$$ $$\sqrt{k}$$, or $$x$$ $$=$$ $$-\sqrt{k}$$, or $$x$$ $$=\sqrt{k}$$. $${\left(3n-2\right)}^2=25$$, we can take square root both sides and get $$3n-2=5$$ or $$3n-2=-5$$.

title: Final Answer
text: Therefore, $$9n^2-12n+4=25$$ has two solutions which are $$n=-1$$ and $$n=\frac{7}{3}$$.
speech: Therefore,  9 n squared, minus 12 n plus 4 is equal to 25  has two solutions which are  n, is equal to, negative 1  and  n, is equal to 7 thirds .
